messages.content: In a few weeks you will have the opportunity to vote for a new MP to represent our community in Parliament. It's going to be a really tight race. Opinion polls show that it's neck and neck between Nick Clegg and me here in Sheffield Hallam. You've already said that we can count on your vote in May. However, we will only win if we can encourage other people to do the same. That's why I'm asking for your help.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Opinion polls show that it's neck and neck between Nick Clegg and me here in Sheffield Hallam.

leaflet.personalStatement: Since 2010 Nick Clegg has turned his back on the promises he made to all of us, damaged vital public services and allowed this government's attacks on the most vulnerable in our community - not least here in Sheffield.

images.caption: Oliver Coppard standing in a room with leaflets and a clipboard, smiling.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet primarily focuses on the candidate's profile and the tight race between him and Nick Clegg; specific policies or issue positions are not detailed.
